introduction1.message: Oi, you! Quick, what do you want?! Can't you see how busy this place is?
introduction1.opt2: My apologies. I have a few questions, if you don't mind.

introduction2.message: I'll remember your face, smartass. Your next order is going to cost you double.
introduction2.opt1: I'm sorry. I have a few questions, if you're available.

default.message: Ask away, though my answers aren't free.
default.meatShortage: Here is the meat you requested.
default.anyWork: Do you have any work for me?
default.anyTrainer: Do you know anyone who could train me?
default.goodbye: That's all for now. Have a good day.

whatIsThisPlace1.message: A tavern. Are you blind? That'll be 20 coins for the enlightenment. Money well spent, I'd say.
whatIsThisPlace1.opt1: Well, I can't argue with that.

anyWorkForMe1.message: Actually, yes! All those lazy rats hanging out here made me run out of crab meat. Bring me some and I'll make it worth your while.
anyWorkForMe1.decline: I think I'll pass. (You will have to pay again if you change your mind)

anyoneWhoCanTrainMe1.message: I believe Marvin specializes in combat training. You can usually find him nearby.
anyoneWhoCanTrainMe1.opt1: Thanks. I'll go look for him.
anyoneWhoCanTrainMe1.opt2: Is he more gold-hungry than you? I don't think that's possible.

anyoneWhoCanTrainMe2.message: Hmph. Just get out of my sight.

anyWorkForMe2.message: Nothing new at the moment. Check back with me later.
